Class.Name: AzEventHandler
Class.Description: Handler for an AZ::Event returned from a BehaviorContent method.

In.Name: Connect
In.Description: Connect the AZ Event to this AZ Event Handler.

In.Name: Disconnect
In.Description: Disconnect current AZ Event from this AZ Event Handler.

OutLatent.Name: OnEvent
OutLatent.Description: Triggered when the AZ Event invokes Signal() function.

Out.Name: On Connected
Out.Description: Signaled when a connection has taken place.

Out.Name: On Disconnected
Out.Description: Signaled when this event handler is disconnected.
